text: So so so #happy that I am not the only one who thinks that #fun is a key element of #innovation and #creativity 💃🕺🏼#flowcon thank you @holly_cummins https://t.co/4ZSUXzM14Q

author.description: Author of Kanban Compass (https://t.co/akiLFCvKJD). Certified TBR Trainer. @aceconf organizer. @AgileClub podcaster. Never enough time to make all ideas happen💃.
author.name: Justyna
